name: Kancelaria Radcy Prawnego r. pr. Sebastian Bohuszewicz Legal Counselors Group
goal:
Legal Counselors Group is a law firm providing legal services and policy advice to our clients on regional, national and european level, covering a wide range of specializations.

Areas of specialization:
- banking law,
- real estate law,
- customs law,
- employment and labor law,
- intellectual property law,
- civil rights.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: The EU policies relevant to the firm include financial and banking regulation, corporate law, intellectual property law, competition, technology & media, privacy, civil rights, transport, real eastate and customs law.
